data.text: @CSM5281 Hi, yes you can book award flights by points. There is more information for your here: https://t.co/nHKLYpBWoM. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@BienNan Hi, I don't, unfortunately, know how long it will take to have it fixed. Please contact our customer service regarding the change. We have trained more agents there so you should hopefully be able to reach them a little bit faster. I am sorry for the inconvenience! -Ada/Finnair
@SrishtyRathee @VisitRovaniemi Hope it tastes as amazing as above the clouds! 💙 Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@BienNan Hi, unfortunately, the issues in Manage booking are still ongoing and being fixed. This, among other things, is causing lots of contacts to our customer service at the moment resulting in long waiting times. I am extremely sorry for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

entity.name: Travel Actions

data.text: Thailand opens again for fully vaccinated travellers from around the world from 1 February onwards. You can travel to Thailand quarantine-free under the Test&Go programme provided that you meet the travel requirements. Read more: https://t.co/gxg7w5xj1J https://t.co/UHIyFcRHWk

urls.title: Nature experiences, well-being, and snow adventures in Lapland
urls.description: Lapland is at its best in the spring side of winter. There is no lack of snowy slopes, and the days are growing longer and sunnier. The different resorts offer plenty to choose from, whether you are a keen sportsperson, looking for local flavours, wanting to try out new activities or just need to rewind in nature. Ivalo is the travel center of Northern Lapland; it has the most nort hern airport in the EU as well as great services such as hotels and restaurants. Ivalo is known for its truly unique nature

data.text: Let us introduce our magical northern destinations: Ivalo, Kittilä, Rovaniemi and Kuusamo! Read our story to find out where is your best bet to see the Northern Lights, where the skiing season usually lasts the longest and where to visit Santa Claus: https://t.co/J8npcw3xgS

@rrdikty Your tier benefits depend on your tier status, and the different ones are explained in the links I already provided you with. They are not dependent on the ticket type you purchase. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@casajdf I am also sorry for the long waiting times in our customer service at the moment, as we are getting an exceptionally large amount of calls. You can find all the phone numbers here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@casajdf Hi, I am truly and sincerely sorry about this! Here are some instructions for a delayed bag: https://t.co/Et9mAtDc3R. The average handling time for refunds is currently 14-21 days. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@efim_ilinykh Hi, our current longest flights are HEL-MIA 11h10min, HEL-LAX 11h5min and HKT-HEL 11h5min. Flight times are always longer from east to west. Of course, the flight time always depends on the wind and can also be shorter (or longer) than the scheduled one. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@pouetpo32216018 Hi, you don't need a COVID test when you transfer to an international flight in Helsinki. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.description: Enjoy airport lounge access, priority boarding and other benefits with oneworld Priority, the frequent flyer benefits from the oneworld. Exceptions may apply.

data.text: @kjgufkujhfcvu Hi, unfortunately, we do not have such a policy, unless you have purchased the Finnair Cancellation Cover: https://t.co/XnxMC5p8aj with your flight ticket. Please see if your travel insurance will cover the expenses in such a case. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@iamSumitVispute @FinnairHelps Hi, please note that it's your own responsibility to check and follow the current restrictions that can change quickly. For now, you do not need a COVID test for transferring at Helsinki Airport or as a resident of Sweden. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@DanaeVirgilio @FinnairHelps Hi, do you mean that the phone number for Chile is out of service or that the line is busy? We are currently getting more calls than ever before. We don't unfortunately have an email address, but all the phone numbers are here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@smashley3747 Hi Ashley, this year there is no such option, unfortunately! Hopefully, we will get that route back for next winter - it hasn't been yet decided. For now, you can fly to Kittilä via Helsinki. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: @kjgufkujhfcvu Hi, unfortunately, there is no exception in this case, unless you have bought the Finnair Cancellation Cover within your ticket: https://t.co/XnxMC5p8aj. If you have travel insurance on your own, it might also cover some expenses. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
You can see the current opening hours of Helsinki Airport's restaurants here: https://t.co/QhWwv6ZPoW

urls.title: Pre-order meals
urls.description: Make the most of your time in the air with Finnair's pre-order sandwiches and tasty hot meals for Economy Class flights.

data.text: Due to Finland’s current restrictions, also other restaurant services at Helsinki Airport along with the Finnair Lounges are currently restricted and close by 6 p.m. To avoid hunger, you can pre-order a sandwich for your flight: https://t.co/6k6wX12DaG.

urls.title: Travelling to Finland
urls.description: Finland has opened for travel from the EU and Schengen countries. Travel from outside of the EU and Schengen area remains restricted. Finnish authorities define the entry requirements to Finland. See more detailed instructions below. Please also note that travel restrictions are subject to change at short notice. As a traveller, you are always responsible for ensuring that you fulfil the requirements of your destination and possible transit country. You can check the current entry restrictions to Finland

data.text: @rachelDMG @Expedia Hi, you can find all our phone numbers here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. We are currently getting more calls than ever before so the waiting times are unfortunately long. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@werre8892 Hi, I am extremely sorry for the long waiting time in our customer service! We are getting more calls than ever before. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@MasterAshkir Hi, I am very sorry for the long waiting times in our customer service at the moment! We are getting there more contacts than ever. 50 new employees are starting there soon, which will hopefully help the situation. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@DanaeVirgilio @FinnairHelps Hi, I am very sorry for the congestion in our customer service, as we are currently getting more contacts there than ever before. Please try to contact us again via chatbot or phone call, you can find all the phone numbers here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@ZyiawithFelica Hi, our customer service is currently getting more contacts than ever before so the waiting times are unfortunately long - I am sincerely sorry about that! Please try to reach us via the chat on our website or by phone call: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@Geral18906758 I am sorry for the inconvenience! As I said before, the handling time is currently 14-21 days on average. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@28frd Happy to help! Hope to see you on board soon! ✈️ Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: @chrnadig Hi, if you don't receive the seats you have paid for, you can apply for a refund here https://t.co/hxX56GTfbR or you could still see if our customer service can double-check this and give you the seat you have paid for. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@Ewar41 Hi, I am sincerely sorry about this inconvenience! However, I don't, unfortunately, have access to our booking system so please contact our customer service regarding this: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@josenamen Hi José, what kind of question do you have? Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@NashG88 Hi, it's not impossible but the waiting times in our customer service are unfortunately long and I apologise for that! Our customer service is at the moment getting more contacts than ever before. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@Sauljuksss Hi, correct - you do not need it then. Have a nice flight! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Change your booking flexibly
urls.description: With our updated ticket policy, you can now change your travel dates with more flexibility. Book Finnair flights and travel with confidence!

data.text: @Geral18906758 Hi, currently our refund handling time is 14-21 days on average. Was your ticket type refundable or flight cancelled? Here is more information on our flexible booking policy: https://t.co/NQN3hfqxdl. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@ricky200933 Hi, we are sorry for the current restrictions coming from the Finnish government. Unfortunately, restaurants and lounges at the airport need to close at 6 p.m. I am sorry for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@balvindersg @FinnairHelps Hi, you can find our customer service phone numbers here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy and give feedback through the link I provided with you earlier. I don't, unfortunately, have access to the booking system etc. I apologise for the long waiting times! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@28frd Hi, we plan to start operating to Fukuoka on 26 April first twice a week and then later in the summer 3 times a week. Fukuoka is our seasonal route so we do not fly there during the winter at all. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@RandyTa23532540 Hi, if you have requested a refund, our average handling time for refunds is 7-14 days, and some requests may unfortunately take more time to be handled. I don't, unfortunately, have access to the system to check the current status. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@donaldwong37 Hi, I sincerely apologise for the inconvenience! Please make the change with the help of our customer service. You can find their phone numbers here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.description: The Finnair fleet is one of the most modern in Europe, which means we've been able to cut our emissions while you get to enjoy top-notch travel comfort.

urls.title: Feedback and compensation
urls.description: We are currently experiencing backlog in our customer service. We are sorry for the delay in replying to your feedback. Thank you for your patience! We appreciate your feedback and are here to assist you with your claims and other concerns. Your feedback is valuable to us in developing our services further. For more general topics, please check our frequently asked questions, or get assistance from our chat service at any

data.text: @balvindersg Hi, I apologise for this inconvenience! You can give us feedback here: https://t.co/QnwlxpQKFS. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@swest1991 @traveloneworld Hi Stefano, we hope you enjoyed your time above the clouds with us and your luxurious space in A350! Welcome on board again! 🥰 Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

Due to the current pandemic situation and restrictions in Finland and globally, we have decided to slightly postpone the unveiling of our fully renewed long-haul cabin that was originally planned for January. Stay tuned, we look forward to telling you more as soon as possible. https://t.co/SpTcQf2SXs

@BhmnRhpsdyQ Hi, cancellation goes according to your ticket type but you should at least be able to reschedule. Please contact our customer service regarding this: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@jlim100 Hi, our customer service is currently unable to read DMs, please reach them through the chat on our website or by calling them: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. You can also check out our FAQs: https://t.co/DpukIZClDz if those could provide you with an answer. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@jimbo888 Thank you! I received this same feedback yesterday and sent it forward. Wishing you a nice day! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: Are you travelling from Finland to Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Greece, Latvia, Lithuania, the Netherlands, Norway or Spain? You can confirm your coronavirus certificates before your journey when checking in online or through the Finnair app: https://t.co/mUFDqnGGPX https://t.co/gpB7NfTM4e

Changes to our long-haul flights: The start of our new Dallas service will move to March 27. The start of Nagoya flights and added frequencies to Osaka will move to the summer season. https://t.co/QeKkKieBxS

data.text: We are reducing our traffic programme in Feb by 20% as increasing sick leaves take their toll. The majority of the cancelled flights are on routes where we operate multiple daily flights, so we can usually offer an alternative flight on the same day. https://t.co/QeKkKieBxS https://t.co/pz7NwpiUyo

urls.title: Finnair Lounges at Helsinki Airport
urls.description: Combining Nordic design, atmosphere and hospitality, our lounges at Helsinki Airport invite you to spend a hassle-free moment before your flight. There are three lounges at Helsinki Airport – Finnair Lounge in the Schengen side and Finnair Business Lounge and Finnair Platinum Wing in the non-Schengen side of the airport.

data.text: As there are new and stricter restrictions for restaurants in Finland, we will need to close the Finnair Lounges at Helsinki Airport at 6 p.m. The alcohol service ends at 5 p.m. These opening hours are valid as of today and until the end of January. https://t.co/UzI3bxjLBg https://t.co/1r4hVgsHTA

@Fruit_Punks Hi, I am extremely sorry for the long waiting times in our customer service at the moment as we are getting more contacts than ever before. Please try again, you can find all the phone numbers here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: @Clotilde_Lm @lufthansa Hi, you can give us feedback: https://t.co/QnwlxpQKFS and apply for a refund here: https://t.co/hxX56GTfbR. I, unfortunately, can't help you any further. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@claucastillo_10 Hi Claudia, I am sincerely and extremely sorry that this message hasn't been updated, even though we try our very best to keep all our information up-to-date. According to the newest rule, a negative test result is required also from EU/Schengen area. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: @Clotilde_Lm @lufthansa Hi, I am very sorry for your flight being delayed! What kind of assistance would you now need? Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

The Regional State Administrative Agency for Southern Finland (AVI) has ruled that the current restrictions that apply to restaurants in Finland, also apply for Finnair and Norra’s domestic flights. Thus, we cannot sell alcoholic beverages on our domestic flights after 5 p.m. https://t.co/thoVpRB7yq

data.text: @alanelgordito Hi, have you tried contacting your destination airport's lost and found or was your destination Helsinki when you lost it? I, unfortunately, don't have any more information than the Lost&Found at Helsinki Airport. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@RC_Panda121 Hi, I apologise for the inconvenience! If you aren't able to make the change in our Manage booking, please contact our customer service: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy and they can help you. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@GarrettLeyenaar Hi, the waiting times are unfortunately very long in our customer service right now, as we are getting more calls than ever before. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@GokceMe @AmySneddon17 Hi, I am very sorry for the inconvenience! If you aren't able to change your flight in our Manage booking, please contact our customer service and they can help you: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
